name: com.gameassemblylab.gameassemblies
description: A Unity-based game development library for creating local multiplayer games centered around resource conversion and goal achievement mechanics. Provides comprehensive systems for resource management, station-based production, goal tracking, level management, and player coordination - perfect for building cooperative and competitive multiplayer experiences inspired by games like Overcooked.

samples.description: Complete sample content including prefabs, scenes, and tutorials demonstrating how to use the Game Assemblies library. These examples showcase various systems including resource management, stations, goals, player controllers, and complete game setups. Use these as reference implementations and starting points for your own games.
